# Emergency Decision Rules Sources

## Licensing Note
These decision rules are derived from published clinical research and official guidelines and are freely implementable with proper citation. This project uses original descriptions and does not copy proprietary content.

## Ottawa Ankle Rules
- Stiell IG, et al. Ann Emerg Med 1992;21:384-390 and related validation studies.
- NSW Agency for Clinical Innovation (ACI) Ottawa Ankle Rules (adult) criteria summary.

## Ottawa Knee Rules
- Stiell IG, et al. Ann Emerg Med 1995;26:405-413. (Derivation)
- PubMed abstract and validation summaries.

## Canadian C-Spine Rule
- Stiell IG, et al. JAMA 2001;286:1841-1848. (Derivation)

## PERC Rule
- Kline JA, et al. J Thromb Haemost 2004;2:1247-1255. (Derivation)

## Additional Guidance
- NICE NG158: Venous thromboembolic diseases (for PE diagnostic pathways).
